page.title: 20CLUBS IN ST.MARTINS
page.content: The{Ifton Welfare Junior Band}was formed in{1978.}There are about{15 {players}in the band and their ages are from{six to fifteen years.}The band practise every{Wednesday}night from 7.00.to 9.00.p.m.in the hall at the {Ellesmere Road Chapel.}The instruments in the band are all{brass}and include cornets, trombones and horns. At{ {Christmas}the band play at{Senior {Citizens'}parties and tour the village playing carols. The{1st.St.Martins Brownie Pack}was started in October{1977.}The Brownie Guider is Mrs.Joyce Sands.The age of the Brownies is between{7 and 10 years {old.}There are about{25}in the pack and they meet every{Tuesday}at 6.00.p.m.in the{Old School Hall.}The weekly subscription is{20p.}During the evening the Brownies take part in{ {games,craft activities}and{singing.
